cluster_description: Requirements addressing how easily games can be used by elderly users. Includes controls, visibility, and clarity.
Requirements for smooth and effective game execution, including system load handling and responsiveness during gameplay.
Requirements ensuring games achieve their intended health benefits such as motor or cognitive improvements.
Requirements related to the comfort, discretion, and non-stigmatizing nature of wearables and assistive tech. Emphasizes aesthetics, emotional impact, and integration with personal identity.
